reviews.review_msg: One of the best professors I have ever had. Compassionate, wholesome, and passionate about what he teaches. The course was 3 hours of total lecture content per week, weekly quizzes and 50 minute synchronous discussion; no readings. Very responsive and loves engaging with his students. Midterm was crazy easy, final was harder with 83MC and 23SA.

This class was relatively easy. Lectures and slides were available early in the week. Very time-consuming; consisted of 2 (1 hour each) recorded lectures a week + 1 hour of live discussion that you could go for participation marks. Overall, Dr. Palsson was very approachable and clearly explained the course material and his expectations.
Dr. Palsson's lectures are original, interesting, and well-organized. He clearly cares about the success of his students and is very accommodating to their requests.
